title: Ripley's Twists: Pirates
description: Ripley’s Twists: Pirates is the latest in Ripley's Believe It or Not's popular reference series for ages 8+ where historical facts are presented in an entertaining, easy-to-read style kids love. From Captain Kidd and Henry Morgan to fictional pirates like Captain Jack Sparrow and modern-day pirates in Somalia, it’s a treasure trove of true-life tales—with a Ripley’s twist!
author: Believe It or Not!
